entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain late in the morning. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
